running_shoes.name: Nike Alphafly 3
running_shoes.description: Our premier marathon racing shoe, designed to help you chase your next PR with relentless propulsion and energy return.
features: Full-length carbon-fiber Flyplate
High-stack ZoomX midsole for maximum cushioning
Dual Nike Air Zoom units in the forefoot
Atomknit upper for a contoured, lightweight fit
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Alphafly is engineered for peak performance on race day, offering our highest energy return for marathoners.

running_shoes.name: Nike Vaporfly 3
running_shoes.description: A versatile racer that can handle any distance, from a 10K to a marathon, with a propulsive feel and stability.
features: Full-length carbon-fiber Flyplate
Responsive ZoomX foam midsole
Flyknit upper for breathability
Updated thin outsole rubber for durability
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Vaporfly is a race-day favorite, beloved for its blend of speed and stability across various distances.

running_shoes.name: Nike Streakfly
running_shoes.description: Our lightest racing shoe, made for shorter distances like 5K and 10K with a low-profile, connected-to-the-ground feel.
features: Low-profile ZoomX midsole
Midfoot shank for stability
Ultra-thin knit upper
Data-informed outsole traction pattern
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Streakfly is your go-to for shorter road races, offering an incredibly lightweight and responsive feel.

running_shoes.name: Nike Zoom Fly 5
running_shoes.description: A durable training and racing shoe that bridges the gap between your everyday runs and race day, offering a propulsive sensation.
features: Articulated carbon-fiber plate
ZoomX foam for responsive cushioning
Forefoot and heel have slightly wider bases for a stable platform
Dynamic lace-up fit with midfoot containment
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Zoom Fly is a durable speedster, perfect for both race day and your toughest training sessions.

running_shoes.name: Nike Pegasus 41
running_shoes.description: A springy ride for every run, the Peg helps you fly through your daily miles with a familiar, just-for-you feel.
features: ReactX foam midsole for a smooth ride
Forefoot and heel Air Zoom units
Engineered mesh upper for breathability
Waffle-inspired outsole for excellent traction
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Pegasus is the definition of a daily trainer, offering a balanced feel that's perfect for runners of all levels.

running_shoes.name: Nike Structure 25
running_shoes.description: If you're looking for a shoe with trusted stability, the Structure 25 is there for you, offering a supportive yet smooth ride.
features: Cushlon 3.0 foam and a Zoom Air unit
Updated midfoot system for better support
Durable rubber sole with grooves for flexibility
More foam than previous versions for better cushioning
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Structure provides trusted stability for runners who overpronate, ensuring a smooth and secure ride.

running_shoes.name: Nike Vomero 17
running_shoes.description: A luxurious, plush ride for your daily miles. The Vomero delivers premium comfort with a springy, energetic feel underfoot.
features: Dual-density midsole with ZoomX on top and Cushlon 3.0 below
Engineered mesh upper for breathability
Plush tongue and collar
High-abrasion rubber outsole
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Vomero is your go-to for maximum cushioning and comfort on everyday runs, providing a soft yet responsive experience.

running_shoes.name: Nike Pegasus Trail 5
running_shoes.description: Your trusted workhorse with wings takes to the trails. It's perfect for those who want a versatile shoe for both road and trail.
features: React foam for a cushioned, responsive ride
Rubber outsole with a shockwave-like pattern for traction
Mesh in key areas for breathability
Dynamic Fit band system through the midfoot for secure support
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Pegasus Trail is a versatile hybrid, offering comfort on the road and confident grip on the trail.

running_shoes.name: Nike Kiger 9
running_shoes.description: A nimble and lightweight trail shoe that gives you a low-to-the-ground feel for navigating technical terrain with speed.
features: Full-length React foam midsole
Zoom Air unit in the forefoot
Multi-directional traction lugs in the heel
Rock plate to help shield your foot
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Kiger is built for speed on the trails, offering a nimble and connected feel for technical terrain.

running_shoes.name: Nike Wildhorse 8
running_shoes.description: A rugged and durable trail runner designed for tough terrain and long miles, offering a blend of cushioning and traction.
features: Full-length React foam for a soft, smooth ride
Midfoot saddle to keep your foot contained
High-abrasion rubber outsole with multi-directional lugs
Ankle collar to keep out dirt and debris
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Wildhorse is a rugged workhorse for the trails, built to handle tough terrain with comfort and durability.

running_shoes.name: Nike Juniper Trail 2
running_shoes.description: A consistent ride for your off-road runs. It has a tough traction and a lightweight design so you can keep moving on challenging terrain.
features: Tapered lugs for grip on rocky roads
Internal bootie wraps the foot for a secure, sock-like fit
Flywire cables for stability
Mesh upper for breathability
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Juniper Trail offers reliable traction and comfort, making it a great entry point for new trail runners.

running_shoes.name: Nike Ultrafly
running_shoes.description: A revolutionary trail racing shoe that brings carbon plate technology to the off-road world for unparalleled speed.
features: Carbon Flyplate sandwiched between ZoomX foam
Vibram Litebase outsole with Traction Lugs
Vaporweave upper for durability and water-shedding
Protective midsole wrap
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Ultrafly is Nike's premier trail racing shoe, combining carbon plate technology with aggressive traction for ultimate speed.

running_shoes.name: Nike Zegama 2
running_shoes.description: Designed to conquer technical terrain, offering great grip and stability to keep you going on your longest trail adventures.
features: ZoomX foam midsole for responsive cushioning
Deeper, diverse lug pattern for enhanced grip
Engineered mesh upper for stability and breathability
Ankle gaiter to limit trail debris
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Zegama is built for navigating the most challenging terrain, providing maximum grip and cushioning.

running_shoes.name: Nike Pegasus 40 (Kids)
running_shoes.description: The same reliable ride as the adult version, tuned for a kid's foot. Perfect for the playground, gym class, and track.
features: Kid-specific Zoom Air unit in the forefoot
Cushioning foam for a responsive feel
Breathable mesh upper
Durable rubber sole
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Kids' Pegasus offers young athletes a versatile, comfortable, and reliable shoe for all their activities.

running_shoes.name: Nike Vomero 17 (Kids)
running_shoes.description: Maximum cushioning for kids who love to run and play all day, providing a soft and bouncy feel.
features: Soft and responsive foam
Supportive midfoot band
Reinforced toe tip for durability
Easy on-and-off design
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Kids' Vomero provides top-tier cushioning for active kids, ensuring comfort during all-day play.

running_shoes.name: Nike Sonic Fly (Kids)
running_shoes.description: A speedy and lightweight shoe for kids who want to feel fast, whether they're racing their friends or running in a competition.
features: Lightweight and breathable design
Soft foam underfoot for cushioning
Rubber sole for durable traction
Hook-and-loop strap for a secure fit
running_shoes.educational_blurb: The Sonic Fly is all about speed, offering a lightweight and secure fit for young runners on the move.
